verses.verse: <S%H3588>"When<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and shall <S%H5394>clear<s%> <S%H5394>away<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you,

and when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you shall <S%H5221>defeat<s%> them, then you shall <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them. You shall <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them and <S%H2603>show<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2603>favor<s%> to them.

"Furthermore, you shall not <S%H2859>intermarry<s%> with them; you shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

"For they will <S%H5493>turn<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> Me to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%> then the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and He will <S%H4118>quickly<s%> <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you.

"But <S%H3541>thus<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to them: you shall <S%H5422>tear<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H7665>smash<s%> their [sacred] <S%H4676>pillars,<s%> and <S%H1438>hew<s%> <S%H1438>down<s%> their <S%H842>Asherim,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H6456>graven<s%> <S%H6456>images<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

"For you are a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> for His own <S%H5459>possession<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did not <S%H2836>set<s%> His <S%H2836>love<s%> on you <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> you <S%H3588>because<s%> you were <S%H7231>more<s%> in <S%H7231>number<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> for you were the <S%H4592>fewest<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%>

but <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> you and <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your forefathers, the <S%H1>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>brought<s%> you out by a <S%H3318>mighty<s%> <S%H2389>hand,<s%> and <S%H3027>redeemed<s%> you from the <S%H6299>house<s%> of <S%H1004>slavery,<s%> from the <S%H5650>hand<s%> of <S%H3027>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6547>king<s%> of <S%H4428>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3045>"Know<s%> therefore that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> He is <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to a <S%H505>thousandth<s%> generation with those who <S%H157>love<s%> Him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

but <S%H9608>repays<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> Him to their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> to destroy them; He will not <S%H6>delay<s%> with him who <S%H309>hates<s%> Him, He will <S%H8130>repay<s%> him to his <S%H9608>face.<s%>

"Therefore, you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

"Then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H6118>because<s%> you <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8104>keep<s%> with you His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your forefathers.

"And He will <S%H157>love<s%> you and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you; He will also <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your womb and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> your <S%H1715>grain<s%> and your <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine<s%> and your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>herd<s%> and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your forefathers to <S%H1>give<s%> you.

"You shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> male or female <S%H6135>barren<s%> among you or among your <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5493>remove<s%> from you <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2483>sickness;<s%> and He will not <S%H7760>put<s%> on you <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H7451>harmful<s%> <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3045>known,<s%> but He will <S%H5414>lay<s%> them on <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you.

"And you shall <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to you; your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> for that [would be] a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to you.

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you should <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H428>'These<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H7227>greater<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I; <S%H351>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> I <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them?'

you shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them; you shall <S%H2142>well<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>trials<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> and the <S%H226>signs<s%> and the <S%H4159>wonders<s%> and the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and the <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out. <S%H3651>So<s%> shall the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> you are <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

<S%H1571>"Moreover,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> against them, <S%H5704>until<s%> those who are <S%H7604>left<s%> and <S%H5641>hide<s%> themselves from you perish.
"You shall not <S%H6206>dread<s%> them, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5394>clear<s%> <S%H5394>away<s%> <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H4592>little<s%> by <S%H4592>little;<s%> you will not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3615>put<s%> an <S%H3615>end<s%> to them <S%H4118>quickly,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H9130>beasts<s%> <S%H7235>grow<s%> <S%H5921>too<s%> <S%H7235>numerous<s%> for you.

"But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and will <S%H1949>throw<s%> them into <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>confusion<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they are <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

"And He will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> so that you shall make their <S%H8034>name<s%> perish from <S%H6>under<s%> <S%H8478>heaven;<s%> <S%H8064>no<s%> <S%H3808>man<s%> will be able to <S%H376>stand<s%> <S%H3320>before<s%> you <S%H6440>until<s%> you have <S%H5704>destroyed<s%> them.

"The <S%H6456>graven<s%> <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods<s%> you are to <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> you shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> or the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that is on them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> it for yourselves, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you be <S%H3369>snared<s%> by it, for it is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And you shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> into your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3644>like<s%> it <S%H1961>come<s%> <S%H9172>under<s%> the <S%H9172>ban;<s%> you shall <S%H8262>utterly<s%> <S%H8262>detest<s%> it and you shall <S%H8581>utterly<s%> <S%H8581>abhor<s%> it, for it is <S%H9172>something<s%> <S%H9172>banned.<s%>
